aboutme.name: Self Introduction
aboutme.description: Greetings. My name is Chanyu Choung. I'm from South Korea and I'm currently a student at Lehman College pursuing for Bachelor's Degree.

aboutme.name: My Majors
aboutme.description: I currently major in both Computer Science and CGI. I'm expected to graduate at Fall of 2022. I love video games and both of my majors help with me creating my very own video game.

aboutme.name: My Interests
aboutme.description: My interests are watching K-Drama or Youtube, listening to the pop musics and playing video games. I don't SNS, but I socialize with people who have similar interests to me.

aboutme.name: My Resume
aboutme.description: My Resume can be seen at 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cchanyu/ cchanyu.github.io/master/src/contents/Resume.jpg'. Github Username: Cchanyu

aboutme.name: My Dream
aboutme.description: My dream is to become a full-time software engineer at New York. I'm willing to try my best to land a job and give it all I got. It's not easy, but it's a set of challenge that I have to overcome.

aboutme.name: My Strength
aboutme.description: My strength comes from being into it. I fully dedicate myself and forget everything else, but to the task itself. I burn with the passion, motivation and dedication.
